meanings.definition: A type of sandal typically made of rubber or plastic with a thong strap.
meanings.sent1: I wore my jandal to the beach to protect my feet from the hot sand.
meanings.sent2: She slipped on her jandal before heading out for a walk.
meanings.sent3: The jandal squeaked with every step, making a funny sound.
meanings.sent4: His jandal was like a colorful shield against the rough ground.
meanings.sent5: The bright red jandal stood out among the crowd of shoes.

meanings.sent1: I jandaled my way through the park, enjoying the breeze on my toes.
meanings.sent2: They always jandal when they go to the pool to avoid slipping.
meanings.sent3: He decided to jandal even in the rain, much to his friends' amusement.
meanings.sent4: She jandaled her way to the top of the hill, feeling unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: Jandaling around the house made her feel relaxed and carefree.
